member.name: DDiscFormat2TrackAtOnceEvents.Update
member.summary: Implement this method to receive progress notification of the current track-writing operation.

param.name: object
param.para: The interface that initiated the write operation.
This parameter is a MsftDiscFormat2TrackAtOnce object in script.

param.name: progress
param.para: An interface that you use to determine the progress of the write operation.
This parameter is a MsftDiscFormat2TrackAtOnce object in script.

member.name: DDiscFormat2TrackAtOnceEvents
member.summary: Implement this interface to receive notifications of the current track-writing operation.
